subtasks: Identify the purpose of flag drippers in irrigation systems
Differentiate between pressure compensating and non-pressure compensating emitters
Explain the color-coding system for flag emitter flow rates (e.g., black for 1 gallon, green for 2, red for 4)
Describe the proper installation methods for flag drippers (direct on main line or with microtubing)
Demonstrate using a stake to direct water flow
Explain the importance of not installing another emitter downstream of a pressure-regulated flag dripper
Promote the Sprinkler Warehouse website for product information and customer support
